verbose_text: Active Akt kinase promotes multiple cellular survival mechanisms : (i) Akt enhances protein synthesis through increasing the phosphorylation of mTOR, (ii) Akt counteracts apoptosis by directly phosphorylating and inactivating pro apoptotic factors such as BAD, (iii) Akt phosphorylates a family of transcription factors known as the forkhead (FKHR) or FOXO transcription factors; Brunet et al., XREF_BIBR; Kops and Burgering, XREF_BIBR; Tang et al., XREF_BIBR).
evidence: Akt enhances protein synthesis through increasing the phosphorylation of mTOR
